messages.title: Standing up for our NHS
messages.content: The NHS is Labour's greatest achievement. It was born in Wales, introduced by our own Nye Bevan. Recently the Tory Government held secret talks with America about increasing the cost of medicines for our NHS. This is a taste of what is to come if Boris Johnson wins a majority and pursues a hard Brexit.

messages.title: Serving the constituency
messages.content: Serving the constituency where I live as your MP is a great honour. Should you re-elect me on 12th December I pledge to continue to represent you to the very best of my ability.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I lobbied successfully to deliver the new £36m state-of-the-art Cardiff West High School, and for investment in new school buildings in the west of the city, including at Fitzalan, Cantonian, and in our primary schools.
I've been a driving force in changing the law to stop and punish cowboy parking firms blighting the lives of Cardiff residents through unfair ticketing practices and harassment.

I've campaigned for more social housing in Cardiff West, helping to secure new homes in the west of the city, such as the Mill Estate at Ely Bridge. Now Labour in Cardiff has pledged to build 2,000 new council homes in the next 2 years.

issues.education: I've lobbied successfully to deliver the new £36m state-of-the-art Cardiff West High School, and for investment in new school buildings in the west of the city, including at Fitzalan, Cantonian, and in our primary schools.
issues.environment: I will fight for greener public transport
issues.health: The NHS is Labour's greatest achievement.
issues.labourEmployment: Raise the minimum wage to £10 per hour.
issues.transport: I will fight for greener public transport.

community.content: I've campaigned for more social housing in Cardiff West, helping to secure new homes in the west of the city, such as the Mill Estate at Ely Bridge. Now Labour in Cardiff has pledged to build 2,000 new council homes in the next 2 years.

leaflet.personalStatement: Serving the constituency where I live as your MP is a great honour. Should you re-elect me on 12th December I pledge to continue to represent you to the very best of my ability.

endorsements.endorsement: Kevin used Parliament to help my business when the banks stopped lending. He fights successfully for local people without fear or favouring of vested influences. We need more politicians like Kevin.

quotes.text: The NHS is Labour's greatest achievement. It was born in Wales, introduced by our own Nye Bevan. Recently the Tory Government held secret talks with America about increasing the cost of medicines for our NHS. This is a taste of what is to come if Boris Johnson wins a majority and pursues a hard Brexit.
